heroTitle: Hello, I'm Kamil. Building high-performance apps and scalable web products.
heroDescription: Fullstack Developer bridging backend logic with UI/UX precision. Specializing in the React/Next.js ecosystem and rapid delivery of business value (MVP).
aboutBody: Product-minded engineer. I don't just write code; I help turn ideas into stable business solutions. I prioritize clean architecture, transparent communication, and iterative product improvement.
phoneToast: For privacy reasons, please contact me via email first.

timeline.title: Frontend Developer
timeline.place: dsfrgra rtg5ysrd cbvzcvb Sp. z o.o.
timeline.desc: Development of core internal tools. Designed an analytics Dashboard (React) with full GitHub API integration. Modernized 'Campaign Builder' architecture (migration to Vite/pnpm, Node.js). Implemented generative AI for Figma and built a custom caching translation API (AlmaLinux).

timeline.title: Fullstack Freelancer
timeline.desc: End-to-end web solutions for the SME sector. From requirements analysis to design, deployment, and maintenance. Open Source software development and administration of high-load Linux servers.
